    • getConfigs

      public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getConfigs(String name, boolean detailed)
      Get the configuration details for the specified class.
      Parameters:
      name - the fully qualified class name or config file
      detailed - true for verbose mode, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the config response object

    • getEmissaryConfig

      public static ConfigsResponseEntity getEmissaryConfig(String cfg) throws IOException
      Get the key/value pairs for a configuration file. Returns one output for all combined flavored configs.
      Parameters:
      cfg - the config file
      Returns:
      the config response object
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getEmissaryConfigDetailed

      public static ConfigsResponseEntity getEmissaryConfigDetailed(String cfg) throws IOException
      Get detailed output for a configuration file. Returns flavored config files one at a time and then the combined output for all flavors.
      Parameters:
      cfg - the config file
      Returns:
      the config response object
      Throws:
      IOException

    • combineConfigs

      protected static List<String> combineConfigs(String cfg, String[] flavoredConfigs)
      Combine all configs into a single list
      Parameters:
      cfg - the default config
      flavoredConfigs - the flavored configs
      Returns:
      a combined list of flavored configs

    • normalizeEntries

      protected static List<ConfigEntry> normalizeEntries(Configurator cfg)
      Normalize the output generated from the merge of key/value pairs (sort, distinct, etc.)
      Parameters:
      cfg - the configured properties
      Returns:
      a sorted, distinct list of properties

    • addDetail

      protected static void addDetail(ConfigList detailed, List<String> flavors, List<String> configs, String cfgFile)
      Add the configuration properties to the response object
      Parameters:
      detailed - the config list
      flavors - the flavors used to generate properties
      configs - the list of configs used to generate properties
      cfgFile - the config file
